mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rn,a.id realid,g.id brrid,g.MONEY,h.item LONGTIME,g.longtime BID_AMORTIZE,i.item REPAYMENTMETHOD,j.item PURPOSE,g.HOUSINGQUANTITY,g.TOTALPRICE,g.REMARK,to_char(a.AUDITTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') as AUDITTIME,a.AUDITREMARKS,a.id,a.realname,a.address,to_char(a.applicationtime,'yyyy-MM-dd') applicationtime,a.idnumber,a.sex,a.positive,f.item auditorid,a.opposite,b.item housed,c.item academic,d.item marriage,e.item income from tb_realname a left join tb_systemcategoryitem b on a.housed=b.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem c on a.academic=c.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem d on a.marriage=d.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem e on a.income=e.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem f on a.auditorid=f.id left join tb_borrow g on g.realid=a.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem h on g.LONGTIME=h.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem i on g.REPAYMENTMETHOD=i.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem j on g.PURPOSE=j.id where rownum < #{end} and g.STATUS=23 and g.release = 1 ) c where c.rn > #{start}

select count(*) from tb_realname a left join tb_systemcategoryitem b on a.housed=b.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem c on a.academic=c.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem d on a.marriage=d.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem e on a.income=e.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem f on a.auditorid=f.id left join tb_borrow g on g.realid=a.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem h on g.LONGTIME=h.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem i on g.REPAYMENTMETHOD=i.id left join tb_systemcategoryitem j on g.PURPOSE=j.id where g.STATUS=23 and g.release = 1
